title: Star Wars: Boba Fett - Man with a Mission
description: Whether it's taking on an Imperial ship designed to wipe out entire alien species or battling amidst a vicious civil war fueled by both the Rebellion and the Empire, entering an abandoned Star Destroyer seeking a mysterious prize or settling a dispute between an Imperial outpost and the local leadership, there's no job too deadly for the man in the Mandalorian armorâ€”if the price is right!
author: Thomas Andrews; John Ostrander; Cam Kennedy
